title: The Day That Changed Everything On Mt. Everest
teaser: On April 18, 16 Nepalese guides were killed in an avalanche on Mt. Everest. NPR's Tamara Keith talks to Outside Magazine's Grayson Schaffer about the deadliest day in Everest history.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
